## Syllabus 

| Math 2210Q - Linear Algebra
| Fall Semester 2024
| University of Connecticut

#### Overview

 Linear Algebra is a foundational subject in mathematics which is essential to a wide range of applications ranging from population genetics
to neural networks.  In this course we will learn the central ideas of linear
algebra including systems of linear equations, vector spaces and linear transformations, orthogonal geometry, eigenvalues and eigenvectors.
